function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of wearable devices, and user education on proper hygiene practices","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Validation of health data from wearables with traditional medical assessments, education on the limitations of wearable data privacy and consent","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of wearables with clinical testing, and clear guidance on action to take in case of an alert.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strong data encryption and access control learning predictions using multiple sources of data.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automated data collection from wearables, incentivizing user
